languages.text: Голос Мастера вокса Вигдис Сурри Отта из рода Толиман долго звучал в Просторе, неся надежду и возвещая о прибытии милосердного Вольного Торговца. За свою долгую жизнь она обучила не одно поколение будущих Мастеров вокса династии Толиман, славясь мудростью и чутким пониманием корабельных систем. Тело ее было встроено в механизмы капитанского мостика, и в час нужды вокс вещал ее голосом, развеивая мороки и отчаянье.

The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Expanse, bringing hope and trumpeting the arrival of the merciful Rogue Trader. Known for her wisdom and acute understanding of ship systems, over her long life she taught many generations of future Vox Masters from the Toliman dynasty. Her body was built into the bridge itself, and in times of need, her voice flowed through the vox, dispelling delusions and despair.
languages.original_text: Голос Мастера вокса Вигдис Сурри Отта из рода Толиман долго звучал в Просторе, неся надежду и возвещая о прибытии милосердного Вольного Торговца. За свою долгую жизнь она обучила не одно поколение будущих Мастеров вокса династии Толиман, славясь мудростью и чутким пониманием корабельных систем. Her body was built into the bridge, and in times of need, her voice flowed through the vox, dispelling delusions and despair.

languages.text: 长久以来，托里曼王朝的音阵大师维格迪斯·苏里·欧塔的声音回荡在科罗努斯扩区，在带来希望的同时，也宣告了仁慈的行商浪人的到来。她拥有过人的智慧，对舰船系统有着独特的敏锐理解，也因此名声煊赫。在漫长的一生中，她教导了托里曼王朝许多代音阵大师。在那之后，她的身体被植入到了舰桥之中。在危急时刻，她的声音会从音阵中传出，驱散妄想和绝望。
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Expanse, bringing hope and trumpeting the arrival of the merciful Rogue Trader. Known for her wisdom and acute understanding of ship systems, over her long life she taught many generations of future Vox Masters from the Toliman dynasty. Her body was built into the bridge itself, and in times of need, her voice flowed through the vox, dispelling delusions and despair.

traits.locale_text: 长久以来，托里曼王朝的音阵大师维格迪斯·苏里·欧塔的声音回荡在科罗努斯扩区，在带来希望的同时，也宣告了仁慈的行商浪人的到来。她拥有过人的智慧，对舰船系统有着独特的敏锐理解，也因此名声煊赫。在漫长的一生中，她教导了托里曼王朝许多代音阵大师。在那之后，她的身体被植入到了舰桥之中。在危急时刻，她的声音会从音阵中传出，驱散妄想和绝望。

languages.text: Die Stimme von Voxmeisterin Vigdis Surri Otta von der Toliman-Dynastie ertönt seit langem in der Ausdehnung, bringt Hoffnung und verkündet die Ankunft {mf|des gnädigen Freihändlers|der gnädigen Freihändlerin}. Sie ist für ihre Weisheit und ihr instinktives Verständnis für Schiffssysteme bekannt und hat in ihrem langem Leben viele Generationen von zukünftigen Voxmeistern der Toliman-Dynastie ausgebildet. Ihr Körper wurde in die Brücke selbst eingebaut, und in Notzeiten strömte ihre Stimme durch das Vox und vertrieb Wahnvorstellungen und Verzweiflung.
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Expanse, bringing hope and trumpeting the arrival of the merciful Rogue Trader. Her body was built into the bridge itself, and in times of need, her voice flowed through the vox, dispelling delusions and despair.

languages.text: La voix de la maîtresse-vox Vigdis Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman résonna pendant longtemps à travers les Étendues, porteuse d'espoir et annonçant l'arrivée {mf|du miséricordieux libre-marchand|de la miséricordieuse libre-marchande}. Réputée pour sa sagesse et son excellente compréhension des systèmes des vaisseaux, elle transmit tout au long de sa vie son savoir aux futurs maîtres-vox de sa dynastie. Son corps fut intégré à la passerelle et, dans les moments difficiles, sa voix se faisait entendre à travers le vox pour dissiper les illusions et le désespoir.
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Expanse, bringing hope and trumpeting the arrival of the merciful Rogue Trader. Known for her wisdom and acute understanding of ship systems, over her long life she taught many generations of future Vox Masters from the Toliman dynasty. Her body was built into the bridge itself, and in times of need, her voice flowed through the vox, dispelling delusions and despair.

traits.locale_text: La voix de la maîtresse-vox Vigdis Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman résonna pendant bien longtemps à travers les Étendues, porteuse d'espoir et annonçant l'arrivée {mf|du miséricordieux libre-marchand|de la miséricordieuse libre-marchande}. Réputée pour sa sagesse et son excellente compréhension des systèmes des vaisseaux, elle transmit tout au long de sa vie son savoir aux futurs maîtres-vox de sa dynastie. Son corps fut intégré à la passerelle et, dans les moments difficiles, sa voix se faisait entendre à travers le vox pour dissiper les illusions et le désespoir.

languages.text: La voz de la maestra de vocos Vigdis Surri Otta de la dinastía Toliman resonó durante mucho tiempo en la Extensión, trayendo con ella la esperanza de la llegada de{mf|l| la} benevolente Comerciante Independiente. Distinguida por su sabiduría y sus detallados conocimientos sobre los sistemas de navegación, enseñó a muchas generaciones de futuros maestros de vocos de su dinastía durante su larga vida. Su cuerpo estaba instalado en el mismo puente y, en tiempos de necesidad, su voz fluía a través de los vocos para combatir las ilusiones y la desesperación.
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Expanse, bringing hope and trumpeting the arrival of the merciful Rogue Trader. languages.text: トリマン王朝のヴォクス・マスター、ヴィグディス・スール・アウタの声は長きにわたってエクスパンスに響き、希望をもたらし、慈悲深い自由開拓者の到来を告げてきた。その知恵と船のシステムに対する造詣の深さで知られる彼女はその長い生涯のを通じ、トリマン王朝から何世代もの未来のヴォクス・マスターを輩出した。彼女の肉体はブリッジそのものに組み込まれており、いざという時には彼女の声がヴォクスを通して流れ、妄想や絶望を払拭した。
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Expanse, bringing hope and trumpeting the arrival of the merciful Rogue Trader. Known for her wisdom and acute understanding of ship systems, over her long life she taught many generations of future Vox Masters from the Toliman dynasty. Her body was built into the bridge itself, and in times of need, her voice flowed through the vox, dispelling delusions and despair.

languages.text: Toliman hanedanlığından Voks Üstadı Vigdis Surri Otta'nın sesi; Enginlik'te uzun süre boyunca duyuldu, umut aşıladı ve merhametli Hür Tacir'in gelişini duyurdu. Kendisi, bilgeliği ve geminin sitemlerine dair uzmanlığıyla tanınıyordu. Ayrıca uzun ömrü boyunca Toliman hanedanlığının gelecek Voks Üstadı nesillerine hocalık etti. Bedeni doğrudan köprüye entegre edilmiş olup ihtiyaç duyulduğunda sesi vokslardan akıyor, yanılgıları ve umutsuzluğu bertaraf ediyordu.
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Expanse, bringing hope and trumpeting the arrival of the merciful Rogue Trader. Known for her wisdom and acute understanding of ship systems, over her long life she taught many generations of future Vox Masters from the Toliman dynasty. Her body was built into the bridge itself, and in times of need, her voice flowed through the vox, dispelling delusions and despair.

traits.locale_text: Toliman hanedanlığından Voks Üstadı Vigdis Surri Otta'nın sesi Enginlik'te uzun süre boyunca duyuldu, umut aşıladı ve merhametli Hür Tacir'in gelişini duyurdu. Bilgeliği ve geminin sitemlerine dair uzmanlığıyla tanınıyordu ve uzun yaşamı boyunca Toliman hanedanlığının gelecek Voks Üstadı nesillerine hocalık etti. Bedeni direkt olarak köprüye entegre edilmişti ve ihtiyaç duyulduğunda sesi vokslardan akıyor, yanılgıları ve umutsuzluğu bertaraf ediyordu.
